scripts.data: cross-env SERVICE_NAME=data PORT=3335 nx serve graph
scripts.socket: cross-env SERVICE_NAME=socket PORT=3336 nx serve graph
scripts.proxy: cross-env SERVICE_NAME=proxy PORT=3337 nx serve graph
scripts.leaderboard: cross-env SERVICE_NAME=leaderboard LEADERBOARD_IDS="3,4,13,14,25,26" nx serve collector
scripts.leaderboard2: cross-env SERVICE_NAME=leaderboard2 LEADERBOARD_IDS="0" nx serve collector
scripts.http-proxy: cross-env SERVICE_NAME=http-proxy PORT=6001 nx serve graph
scripts.log:pdp: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@157.90.121.90 docker logs -f pdp.web.1

scripts.log:ongoing: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@49.12.204.123 docker logs -f ongoing.web.1
scripts.log:lobby: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@49.12.204.123 docker logs -f lobby.web.1
scripts.log:http-proxy: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@116.203.112.201 docker logs -f http-proxy.web.1
scripts.log:legacy: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@157.90.121.90 docker logs -f legacy.web.1
scripts.log:data: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@157.90.121.90 docker logs -f data.web.1
scripts.log:socket: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@167.235.157.26 docker logs -f socket.web.1

scripts.restart:ongoing: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@49.12.204.123 dokku ps:restart ongoing

scripts.stop:match: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@49.12.204.123 dokku ps:stop match
scripts.ssh:socket: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@167.235.157.26 dokku enter socket
